reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 138/04: CITY OF HAMILTON - TRANSITIONAL TAX MATTERS
reg_info.reg_name_text: CITY OF HAMILTON — TRANSITIONAL TAX MATTERS
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 138/04: CITY OF HAMILTON - TRANSITIONAL TAX MATTERS
reg_info.act_under: Municipal Act, 2001   Loi de 2001 sur les municipalités

content.content: 1. Despite subsection 354 (3) of the Act, the City of Hamilton may write off taxes under clause 354 (2) (a) of the Act without first conducting an unsuccessful tax sale under Part XI of the Act. O. Reg. 138/04, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. Despite subsection 354 (3) of the Act, the City of Hamilton may write off taxes under clause 354 (2) (a) of the Act without first conducting an unsuccessful tax sale under Part XI of the Act. O. Reg. 138/04, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for the revocation of this Regulation). O. Reg. 138/04, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for the revocation of this Regulation). O. Reg. 138/04, s. 2.
